layer at (0,0) size 800x600

                  text run at (366,0) width 42: "abcdef"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,54) size 782x526
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,54) size 778x526 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
